summary: Completed frontend testing for HabitFinance app. Main bug fix (SMS Parser) verified working. All core features tested successfully.

ui_bugs.issue: Icons showing as text ('shield', 'airplane', 'phone-portrait') instead of actual Ionicons on Goals tab

issues: Icon names displayed as text instead of rendered icons (CircularProgress component)

action_items: LOW PRIORITY: Fix CircularProgress component icon rendering on Goals tab - icons showing as text instead of Ionicons
critical_code_review_comments: SMS Parser bug fix is correctly implemented - regex patterns now properly extract transaction amount (first amount) not balance (last amount)
data-testid attributes are defined in code but not rendering on web (React Native issue, not a bug)
AdMob service correctly handles web environment by returning false for all ad shows
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend testing completed. SMS Parser bug is FIXED (verified with 5/5 test cases). Tab switching on Challenges screen works. Add Expense screen works. AdMob logic works (MOCKED on web). Minor visual issue: Icons on Goals tab show as text.

test_cases: HDFC Bank SMS extracts 1250 (not 45678.90 balance) - PASSED
Axis Bank SMS extracts 2500 (not 97500 balance) - PASSED
Kotak Bank SMS extracts 3999 (not 28001 balance) - PASSED
canShowAd returns false on web - PASSED

ui_tests.challenges_screen: Tab switching between Challenges and Goals works correctly
ui_tests.add_expense_screen: All elements render correctly (header, toggle, amount, categories, number pad, log button)

mocked_apis.AdMob: Ads are simulated on web preview - real ads only work on native iOS/Android

sms_parser_bug.root_cause: Original regex patterns were capturing the last amount in the SMS (which is the balance) instead of the first amount (transaction amount)
sms_parser_bug.fix_applied: Updated regex patterns to specifically match amount followed by 'debited/spent/credited' keywords and stop before balance keywords like 'Avl Bal', 'Balance', 'Bal'
sms_parser_bug.verification: 5/5 test cases pass - all bank SMS formats correctly extract transaction amount separate from balance
